data.title: Roddy Bottum Archives
data.meta_description: Everything related to Roddy Bottum on MetalSucks, your source for heavy metal news, music reviews and events.
data.text:
The video celebrates gay togetherness during the pandemic. All proceeds will go towards ending conversion therapy.

Says the band, “It’s devaluing when we see Google monopolize on our Pride but do so little to actually enhance and protect the LGBTQIA+ digital experience.”

The band has no plans to make new music despite some upcoming European shows. Is that the right move, a grievous error?

“I think our legacy speaks for itself,” says the keyboardist.

The band’s website now has a clock counting down to 2 p.m. EST on November 26.

The soundtrack to B-movie rituals, slashings, reefer madness, and every other form of horror debauchery.

Sweet new jam makes the wait for FNM’s reunion album gets that much harder.

My face muscles are in pain, for they are not accustomed to smiling so widely for such an extended period of time.

We’re of the totally-not-controversial opinion that “Epic” is one of […]

A dude could be kinda defeated and detached about AIDS, […]
